tweet.text: RT @USTreasury: We mourn the loss and celebrate the life of service & wisdom of former Treasury Secretary George Shultz. An American giant,…
tweet.html: RT @USTreasury: We mourn the loss and celebrate the life of service & wisdom of former Treasury Secretary George Shultz. An American giant, his decades of dedicated public service shaped our country & the work of this department forever. Our Treasury family sends condolences to his family.
